body_html: This https://github.com/bfortuner/pytorch_tiramisu/blob/master/tiramisu-pytorch.ipynb is the model. Upon training the model for semantic segmentation I would like to truncate the model only up to the bottleneck layer.

body: This [https://github.com/bfortuner/pytorch_tiramisu/blob/master/tiramisu-pytorch.ipynb](tiramisu_model) is the model. Upon training the model for semantic segmentation I would like to truncate the model only up to the bottleneck layer.
